content.question: Respond to all parts of the question: a) Identify ONE way in which the views reflected in the image represent a continuity with traditional notions of gender roles. b) Identify ONE way in which the views reflected in the image represent a change from traditional notions of gender roles. c) Explain ONE way in which the format or intended audience of the source may have influenced the way in which gender roles are portrayed in the image.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question: a) Identify ONE way in which the views reflected in the image represent a continuity with traditional notions of gender roles. b) Identify ONE way in which the views reflected in the image represent a change from traditional notions of gender roles. c) Explain ONE way in which the format or intended audience of the source may have influenced the way in which gender roles are portrayed in the image.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
